[b]This Mod is made in Japanese.[/b]
Here is the English translation file.
Steam\steamapps\workshop\content\294100\1514594299\Languages\English
Please rename it if you want to use it in other languages.
Adds 3 kinds of straw beds for animals, made from grass. Small(1×1) ⇒ Ideal for small animals, such as chickens and rabbits. Normal(2×2) ⇒ Ideal for mid-sized animals, from huskies to muffalo. Big(3×3) ⇒ Ideal for large animals such as thrumbos and elephants.
Animal straw bed: A basic bed with mild healing properties. Offers the same comfort/medical effectiveness as the vanilla animal bed.
Animal herbal medicine bed: This bed will heal injuries over time, and offers an improved quality of sleep.
Animal hospital bed: Requires research. A medical bed built specifically to handle severely injured animals.
We recommend that you include [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1098354593]Animals Logic[/url] to allow animal bed ownership.
